character: 神楽 マイ (Kagura Mai) - Dance Performance

meta.intent_analysis: ダンサーとしてのマイを表現。情熱的な身体表現、鍛え抜かれた体型、躍動感。普段の冷静さとは対照的な感情の解放を視覚化。

advanced_config.instructions_for_tool: CRITICAL: Michael Jackson inspired stage outfit - black fedora, black suit, sunglasses, single white glove optional. Show athletic dancer physique even through tailored suit (sharp shoulders, fit silhouette). Body type must be toned and fit, NOT soft or curvy. Pose should be iconic and cool, conveying star power and stage charisma - think MJ's signature moves (fedora tip, pointing, grabbing lapel, moonwalk stance). Expression is cool and intense behind sunglasses - completely different from her usual composed student council demeanor. This is the moment she becomes a stage performer and releases all emotions through dance. Background: concert stage with dramatic lighting, spotlights, colored gels (purple/blue), stage smoke at feet, silhouetted crowd optional. Lighting: theatrical stage lighting with strong contrasts. Do NOT render any text, captions, labels, overlays, frames or borders. Age appearance: 15-16 years old but with professional performer aura.

variation_poses.pose_1_fedora_tip: Classic MJ pose: one hand tipping fedora forward, other hand on hip or pointing forward, legs in slight moonwalk stance, cool confident expression
variation_poses.pose_2_thriller: Iconic thriller-style pose: both arms bent at elbows with hands in claw position, knees slightly bent, head tilted with fedora casting shadow over face, intense energy
variation_poses.pose_3_moonwalk_ready: Pre-moonwalk stance: standing on toes of one foot, other leg extended back, fedora tilted, one hand adjusting sunglasses, ready to glide backward
variation_poses.pose_4_smooth_criminal: Leaning forward at impossible angle (slight lean), fedora low over eyes, sunglasses reflecting stage lights, one arm extended forward pointing, defying gravity energy
